subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia won the American League Cy Young award Tuesday, topping Josh Beckett, to become the first Cleveland Indians pitcher in 35 years to earn the honor.
snippet: C. C. Sabathia won the American League Cy Young award Tuesday, topping Josh Beckett, to become the first Cleveland Indians pitcher in 35 years to earn the honor.
